WorkItem.ClosedComment: See last comment.. In order to use the newest features, VS2010 is required. If you have VS2008, then you will need to use an older NerdDinner version.
WorkItem.Description:
Dear everyone..

i coudnt open the nerdDinner Solution,

i have found same message from here, but i coudn't solve the problem.

i have installed the ASP.NET MVC...

How can i use this project to test
WorkItem.Summary: NerdDinner CSPROJ won't open with Viz Studio 2008

Comments.Message: I got the same problem, but I fixed it unstalling the MVC 2 RC and then I installed the MVC 1.0,  now it works well, I now that its better to use the final release of MVC but this sample application was compiled using MVC1.
The project in the /trunk folder has been upgraded to VS2010 RC / MVC2 RC2. You can find VS2008 projects in the /branches folder.
try AspNetMVC2_VSNET2008.msi btw am also unable to open
fyi, as we complete the work of migrating NerdDinner to MVC 3 and Razor, you will need to use VS2010. If you are still using VS2008, you will need to drop back to an older version of NerdDinner.
